basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are admitted to UTPA for the upcoming academic year. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to students who are admitted to UTPA for the upcoming academic year Student must submit a personal statement including teaching goals, desire to continue working in the Oklahoma Public Schools System, and demonstrate financial need Minimum 3.0 GPA Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
